title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 447 of 2020)), in exercise
heading: 0.3% revaluation of preserved pension benefits for 2020.
text_raw:
0.3% revaluation of preserved pension benefits for 2020. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 February, 2021. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS T.D, 
Minister for Social Protection. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th March, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [87] 3

title: Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 447 of 2020)), in exercise
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations provide for changes in the percentage by which the amount 
of a preserved benefit is to be increased or decreased in a specified year. 

There shall be a minus 0.3% revaluation of preserved benefits under section 33 
of the Pensions Act, 1990, for 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [87]
